/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape below. The street, divided by a concrete median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. A few cars can be seen navigating the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The predominant colors in the image are shades of gray and green, reflecting the blend of urban architecture and natural elements in the cityscape.
